price: Abonsamfoͻ no mu bi wᴐ hᴐ a wͻdͻ sukͻ (koyi nhwene-pa) ma no, san yε nnwuma foforͻ wͻ εno akyi, na Yεn ara na na Yεwεn wͻn.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamina al-shayāṭīni man yaghūṣūna lahu wayaʿmalūna ʿamalan dūna dhālika wakunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīna
